product.subheadline: Boldy state your unique selling point. Included your target audience in the the header or sub-header.

feature1.headline: Multi-organization
feature1.subheadline: Each user can create its own organizations
feature1.feature1Description: The owner of the organization can update general settings
feature1.feature2Description: Can manage members and update subscription

feature2.headline: Multi-tenancy
feature2.subheadline: Decide if you want only one database or one database per tenant
feature2.feature1Description: You only have one database, and a tenant column of your core models
feature2.feature2Description: Each tenant will have its own database for data isolation

feature3.headline: Multi-theme
feature3.subheadline: Using the power of TailwindCSS you can customize your own themes or use a default
feature3.feature1Description: Tailwind based themes so you can focus on design right away
feature3.feature2Description: Files easy to configure to customize your own themes

feature4.headline: Multi-language
feature4.subheadline: You can launch internationally by adding your language
feature4.feature2Description: Files easy to configure to customize your own languages

feature6.headline: And more!
feature6.subheadline: Features based on real world SaaS applications
feature6.feature2Description: Invite users by email or send them an invitation link
feature6.feature3Description: Add resources and assign them to certain subscriptions and roles

feature7.headline: Clean Architecture
feature7.subheadline: We've split the project into multiple 'layers'
feature7.feature1Description: Domain, Application, Infrastructure, WebApi, IntegrationTests, UnitTests
feature7.feature2Description: Every entity has its own repository interface and implementation
feature7.feature3Description: You can control if an entity belongs to a tenant or in the master database

feature8.headline: Unit and Integration Tests
feature8.subheadline: Almost every controller method has its own integration test
feature8.feature1Description: Tests for Authentication, Users, Tenants, Subscriptions, Transactions...
feature8.feature2Description: Include your 'testing' keys, and each test will create new stripe customers
feature8.feature3Description: Test how your subscription mechanism will work against a real world API

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.headline: You can create a test account, these are fake prices

newsletter.title: Not sure yet, but want to know more?
newsletter.signUp: Sign up for our newsletter to stay up to date.
newsletter.subscribedText: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter
newsletter.errorText: There was a problem signin up to the newsletter
